section.title: Installation on Windows/Wine
section.para: For Windows/Wine, the needed gtk libraries may possibly not be preinstalled.

One way to install the required libraries is to download a gtk+-bundle, e.g. gtk+-bundle_3.6.4-20130513_win32.zip (28.8 Mb) from
and unzip it.
This bundle contains
libatk-1.0-?.dll libcairo-?.dll libfontconfig-?.dll libgailutil-?.dll libgdk_pixbuf-2.0-?.dll libgdk-win32-3.0-?.dll libgio-2.0-?.dll libglib-2.0-?.dll libgmodule-2.0-?.dll libgobject-2.0-?.dll libgthread-2.0-?.dll libgtk-win32-3.0-?.dll libpango-1.0-?.dll libpangocairo-1.0-?.dll libpangoft2-1.0-?.dll libpangowin32-1.0-?.dll
Either install the dlls to your windows system path
or move crystal_facet_uml.exe into the same folder as above listed lib*.dllfiles.

listitem.para: With the wine windows emulation, call wine crystal_facet_uml.exe to start,
on Windows, this was not yet tested, but a doubleclick on crystal_facet_uml.exe should be sufficient.
